docs.snippet: Oregon Governor Kate Brown declared a drought emergency on Monday in three southern and central Oregon counties, expanding upon earlier drought declarations the Democrat made in March, as the state faces record low snowpack levels....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oregon Governor Kate Brown declared a drought emergency on Monday in three southern and central Oregon counties, expanding upon earlier drought declarations the Democrat made in March, as the state faces record low snowpack levels.

headline.main: Blackmail and Abuse: Gay Sex Ban in India Stirs Violence
headline.print_headline: Blackmail and Abuse: Gay Sex Ban in India Stirs Violence

docs.snippet: When Rajan was followed by two men into a public toilet in Mumbai and forced to perform oral sex on them, the 31-year-old gay marketing professional realized this was the beginning of the end of his short-lived sexual freedom....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Rajan was followed by two men into a public toilet in Mumbai and forced to perform oral sex on them, the 31-year-old gay marketing professional realized this was the beginning of the end of his short-lived sexual freedom.

headline.main: Arkansas Governor Signs Adoption Law Banning 'Re-Homing'
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Governor Signs Adoption Law Banning 'Re-Homing'

docs.snippet: Spurred by the disclosure that a lawmaker transferred custody of children he had adopted to a family where one of the children was sexually abused, Arkansas' governor on Monday signed legislation barring the practice known as "re-homing."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Spurred by the disclosure that a lawmaker transferred custody of children he had adopted to a family where one of the children was sexually abused, Arkansas' governor on Monday signed legislation barring the practice known as "re-homing."

headline.main: Baltimore Murder Case to Be Featured in New Podcast
headline.print_headline: Baltimore Murder Case to Be Featured in New Podcast

docs.snippet: The story of a Baltimore murder case made famous by last year's record-breaking "Serial" podcast will continue in a new podcast slated to launch on Monday, April 13, according to the new podcast's website....
docs.lead_paragraph: The story of a Baltimore murder case made famous by last year's record-breaking "Serial" podcast will continue in a new podcast slated to launch on Monday, April 13, according to the new podcast's website.

headline.main: Palestinians Want UN Timetable to End Israeli Occupation
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Want UN Timetable to End Israeli Occupation

docs.snippet: The Palestinians are "ready and willing" to see if the U.N. Security Council has "the political will" to adopt a resolution with a deadline for ending Israel's occupation and establishing a Palestinian state, the Palestinian U.N. ambassador said M...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Palestinians are "ready and willing" to see if the U.N. Security Council has "the political will" to adopt a resolution with a deadline for ending Israel's occupation and establishing a Palestinian state, the Palestinian U.N. ambassador said Monday.
